Class FeedbackResource

java.lang.Object

  • Method Details

    • addFeedback

      @POST @Consumes({"application/json","application/xml"}) @Produces({"application/json","application/xml"}) public boolean addFeedback​(Feedback feedback) throws SQLException
      Insert a new Feedback inside the database
      Parameters:
      feedback - - the Feedback to be added
      Returns:
      true if the insertion is completed correctly, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if the connection with the database fails

    • editFeedback

      @PUT @Consumes({"application/json","application/xml"}) @Produces({"application/json","application/xml"}) public boolean editFeedback​(Feedback feedback) throws SQLException
      Edit the Feedback data inside the database
      Parameters:
      feedback - - the Feedback to be edited
      Returns:
      true if the edit is completed correctly, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if the connection with the database fails

    • deleteFeedback

      @DELETE @Path("/{id_film}/{id_user}") @Produces({"application/json","text/plain"}) public boolean deleteFeedback​(@PathParam("id_film") int id_film, @PathParam("id_user") int id_user) throws SQLException
      Delete the Feedback of the specified user regarding the specified film
      Parameters:
      id_film - - the id of the film the feedback refers to
      id_user - - the id of the user who made the feedback
      Returns:
      true if the deletion is completed correctly, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if the connection with the database fails

    • getFeedback

      @GET @Path("/{id_film}/{id_user}") @Produces({"application/json","application/xml"}) public Feedback getFeedback​(@PathParam("id_film") int id_film, @PathParam("id_user") int id_user) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the Feedback of the specified user regarding the specified film
      Parameters:
      id_film - - the id of the film the feedback refers to
      id_user - - the id of the user who made the feedback
      Returns:
      the Feedback object
      Throws:
      SQLException - if the connection with the database fails

    • getFeedbackByFilm

      @GET @Path("/film/{id_film}") @Produces({"application/json","application/xml"}) public ArrayList<Feedback> getFeedbackByFilm​(@PathParam("id_film") int id_film) throws SQLException
      Retrieves all data associated to all Feedbacks of the database associated to the specified film
      Parameters:
      id_film - - the id of the film the feedbacks refer to
      Returns:
      a list of Feedback objects
      Throws:
      SQLException - if the connection with the database fails

    • getFeedbackByUser

      @GET @Path("/user/{id_user}") @Produces({"application/json","application/xml"}) public ArrayList<Feedback> getFeedbackByUser​(@PathParam("id_user") int id_user) throws SQLException
      Retrieves all data associated to all Feedbacks of the database associated to the specified user
      Parameters:
